item.title: Download NWinfo 1.4.4
item.description: NWinfo is a Win32 program that allows you to obtain system and hardware information. It displays essential information about CPU, memory, disk, network, and even system operating details. Because it's portable, you can carry NWinfo on a USB stick and use it on any Windows machine, making it a useful tool for both tech enthusiasts and troubleshooters. item.title: Download ParkControl Pro 5.5.1.8
item.description: ParkControl Pro is free software to display and adjust CPU core settings in real time. It also has a bunch of free power automation features. Core Parking automatically disables CPU cores to save power when idle. Disabled cores are re-enabled as CPU load once again increases. This technology is very similar to frequency scaling, in that it seeks to throttle the CPU when idle. These tweaks are completely safe for any properly configured PC.
